lead_paragraph: On his blog at The Arizona Republic, Kent Somers defended the line of questioning that enraged Cardinals quarterback Derek Anderson on Monday night:
snippet: A reporter for The Arizona Republic explained why he asked the questions that enraged Cardinals quarterback Derek Anderson on Monday night.

headline.main: Derek Anderson's Laughter in a Loss: A Fair Question?

abstract: A reporter for The Arizona Republic explained why he asked the questions that enraged Cardinals quarterback Derek Anderson on Monday night.
